DOC.brief_summary: The FIRST project national fertility preservation registry young woman face cancer treatment . The investigator examine different cancer treatment affect reproductive health young survivor . This prospective cohort study seek recruit young woman close time cancer diagnosis treatment . Participants answer yearly questionnaire current health . A subset participant provide dry blood spot measure reproductive hormone . The primary goal study determine risk infertility time pregnancy young female cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Reproductive Outcomes Young Female Cancer Survivors Through National Fertility Preservation Registry
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed cancer exposure cancer treatment English speaking Ability consent study
